name: TWITTER.COM -  SOFT    [VER 1.2]
description: The theme for the Twitter is softer. Photo of the profile has been rounded. "Who to follow" has been removed. "Actual themes" have been removed. Newsline occupies the whole page. And some little changes. _________________________ If you have any questions or suggestions for improvement, you can contact the author at the following links: Author on VK Author on Twitter Author on Ask.fm
